_source.short_desc: Quickly and seamlessly transition high-caliber applicants to productive contributors, with no data re-entry.
_source.long_desc: Paycom provides user-friendly HR and payroll technology to enhance the entire employee life cycle, all in a single software. From onboarding and benefits enrollment to talent management and more, Paycom streamlines processes, drives efficiencies, increases data integrity and gives employees power over their own HR information through a self-service app. Streamline your self-onboarding process and eliminate the re-keying of data our software before they start on day one.
_source.target_audience: Paycom's single-application software helps companies automate and streamline payroll and HR processes without sacrificing rigorous data security standards.

related_products.short_desc: A visual collaboration tool that creates a shared perspective for your team on any project in a fun, flexible, and rewarding way.
related_products.features: From sales and marketing to HR and operations, teams can design and customize Trello to fit their unique needs and work styles. And with over 100+ integrations with other key tools like Google Drive, Slack, Jira and more, Trello is a living, breathing project hub of cross-team collaboration no matter where your work needs to happen. Trello brings joy to teamwork by making it transparent and easily shareable across boards and teams.

related_products.short_desc: A visual collaboration tool that creates a shared perspective for your team on any project in a fun, flexible, and rewarding way.
related_products.features: From sales and marketing to HR and operations, teams can design and customize Trello to fit their unique needs and work styles. And with over 100+ integrations with other key tools like Google Drive, Slack, Jira and more, Trello is a living, breathing project hub of cross-team collaboration no matter where your work needs to happen. Trello brings joy to teamwork by making it transparent and easily shareable across boards and teams.

related_products.short_desc: Gusto is the all-in-one HR platform for growing businesses-one place to hire, pay, insure, and manage your hardworking team.
related_products.features:
Whether you're just getting started or scaling your fast-growing business, Gusto is the partner you need to grow and nurture your team. With Gusto, you get modern HR features like payroll, benefits, hiring, management resources, and more - all in one place. 

Gusto is proud to serve more than 200,000 businesses across the US with a single trusted system, competitive compensation tools, and expert guidance to help you empower your team. Because when your people thrive, your business thrives too.

related_products.short_desc: Create a custom onboarding platform for each new employee on monday.com's flexible platform.
related_products.features: Create a custom onboarding platform for each employee on monday.com's flexible platform so new hires know exactly what they need to do their first few weeks on the job. Assign all of their team members so they know which tasks they're responsible for. Then create automations to send notifications to IT to let them know to set up accounts and provide equipment; HR managers to remind them to check up on new hires; and team leaders so they can prepare their onboarding materials.

related_products.short_desc: Spend less time on paperwork and more time creating better first days with BambooHR Onboarding.
related_products.features: With Onboarding in BambooHR, you spend less time on formalities and more time creating better first days. From signing new hire paperwork electronically to assigning onboarding tasks, and facilitating personal connections, BambooHR sets your new hires up for success right from the start.

related_products.short_desc: Rippling allows you to onboard new hires in 90 seconds ? 100% online and paperlessly.
related_products.features: Rippling allows you to onboard new hires in 90 seconds. With the click of a button, you can take care of your new hires' offer letter, I-9, employee handbook, payroll, health insurance, 401K, and more -- 100% online and paperlessly. That's why Rippling is The #1 Rated Onboarding Software.

related_products.short_desc: Affordable and easy-to-use onboarding software for any size business. Import Hires, upload state and federal forms, create tasks, etc.
related_products.features: Improve productivity and reduce costs! Our easy-to-use Onboard software includes a new hire portal that serves as a centralized source for new employee information like new hire paperwork and compliance forms. Keep things on track, monitor tasks, and address bottlenecks quicker in the onboarding process for maximum efficiency. Import Hires, upload state and federal forms, create tasks, e-sign documents, set reminders, and more.Try us for 15-days - FREE (no credit card required, no contracts)

related_products.short_desc: With Paychex Flex?, you can remove the stack of new-hire paperwork and give them a positive online user experience.
related_products.features:
Simplify your onboarding process.  Successful onboarding is about efficiency and making a good first impression.  With Paychex, you get easy-to-complete online forms, 
the ability for new hires to complete checklist on a mobile device or laptop, manage and customize the experience with a video, create a personalized message, automated form collection and more.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based human resources solution that helps businesses streamline workforce planning, talent management, and payroll processes.
related_products.features: Workday HCM is a single, cloud-based solution for workforce planning, talent management, and payroll processes. The solution is used by Fortune 500 and G2k companies to operate with agility and efficiency, and for organizations to be ready for whatever comes next. Unlike rigid HR systems or point solutions, Workday HCM delivers a skills-based HCM foundation and continuously innovates to enable customer success as the impact of technology, alternative work arrangements, and employee expectations evolve.

related_products.short_desc: The smarter way for a small business to manage an hourly team. Time clocks, scheduling, payroll, messaging, and HR all in one.
related_products.features:
Homebase makes work easier for 100,000+ small (but
mighty) businesses with everything they need to
manage and pay an hourly team: employee scheduling, time clocks, payroll, team communication, hiring, onboarding, and compliance. 
 
Just don't call us "Human Capital Management." We're tools built for the busiest businesses, so owners and employees can spend less time on paperwork and more time on what matters. 

Learn more at joinhomebase.com.

related_products.short_desc: New hire data is collected electronically and integrated across the Zenefits platform, making onboarding a breeze.
related_products.features: Zenefits doesn't just eliminate the paperwork associated with onboarding, we eliminate the root cause of it. From enrolling a new hire in health insurance to adding an employee to payroll: Zenefits does it all for you. Simply enter a few pieces of a new hire's information and we'll work that employee to take care of the rest.

similar_products.short_desc: Spend less time on paperwork and more time creating better first days with BambooHR Onboarding.
similar_products.features: With Onboarding in BambooHR, you spend less time on formalities and more time creating better first days. From signing new hire paperwork electronically to assigning onboarding tasks, and facilitating personal connections, BambooHR sets your new hires up for success right from the start.

similar_products.short_desc: With compliance reporting, smart forms, and digital signatures, ClearCompany Onboarding adapts to your workflow and saves you time.
similar_products.features: ClearCompany makes completely paperless onboarding simple with automated, online delivery, tracking, collection and storage of all onboarding forms and documents. You'll save time, money and eliminate errors by using ClearCompany's smart forms that put an end to redundant data entry by pre-filling previously entered information and validate data for formatting and accuracy.

similar_products.short_desc: New employees can fill out W4s, upload photos of licenses and certifications, sign digitally, and complete all paperwork digitally!
similar_products.features:
For businesses that are rapidly, seasonally, or just plain constantly hiring, WorkBright takes the cumbersome and traditionally paper-heavy process of onboarding and puts it all online. 

We make it possible for new employees to fill out their W4s, upload photos of licenses and certifications, sign digitally, and complete any and all paperwork from their laptop, tablet, or smartphone before they show up for their first day on the job.

similar_products.short_desc: Payroll and compliance built for the worldwide workforce.
similar_products.features:
Deel is global payroll and compliant hiring built for remote teams, where anyone, anywhere can get hired and paid. Instantly hire full-time employees or independent contractors across the world legally, in minutes. 

With Deel, companies take care of payroll and create localized legal contracts in over 150 countries using a tech-enabled self-serve process.

Deel serves more than 4,500 customers, from SMBs to publicly traded companies.

similar_products.short_desc: EMPTRUST provides  HR Onboarding with a branded portal, e-forms & tasks with Form  I-9, E-Verify software. Use any mobile or device.
similar_products.features: EMPTRUST HR helps companies with talent management using Employee (HR) Onboarding software,   Electronic Form  I-9 &  E-Verify, We  support offboarding, cross-boarding and re-boarding, a branded new hire portal with content including videos to help employees receive information, training, complete employee forms and automate  tasks for the position &  by location. (WOTC), Benefits Management, Screening,  Applicant Tracking, Payroll & Video interviewing are integrated with multiple HRIS systems.

similar_products.short_desc: Atlas spans all aspects of human experience management, so you can fast-track global ambition and simplify HR set-up.
similar_products.features: Atlas enables innovative companies to compete in a global economy, believing that businesses should employ whomever they want, wherever the talent exists. As the largest Direct Employer of Record (EOR), Atlas is a technology platform that is supported by experts and delivers flexibility for companies to expand across borders, onboard talent, manage compliance, and pay their global workforce without the need for a local entity or multiple third-party providers.

similar_products.short_desc: Engaging 23.5 million learners, Absorb LMS has the intuitive interface, agile features and 24/7 support to empower your organization.
similar_products.features: Absorb LMS empowers businesses across the globe to surpass learning goals. Built to deliver flexible training, the intuitive design and robust features create an engaging learning environment that keeps your employees, customers and partners coming back for more. Serving customers in 120 industry verticals, Absorb LMS offers automation and deep reporting capabilities to save time and prove ROI. Tap the scalable LMS that supports integration and security, while offering 24/7 in-house support.

similar_products.short_desc: Personalized user onboarding and in-app training from Pendo. Make every user a product expert from day one.
similar_products.features: Personalized user onboarding and in-app training from Pendo. Make every user a product expert from day one. Demonstrate the value of your applications quickly by guiding users to the features that benefit them most. Set goals and communicate performance so that onboarding is aligned to business results. Segment your customer base and target communications based on individual needs. Personalized guidance means each user can achieve their particular goals.

Simplify your onboarding process.  Successful onboarding is about efficiency and making a good first impression.  With Paychex, you get easy-to-complete online forms,

similar_products.short_desc: Customize your onboarding process and automate the delivery of tasks, policies, orientation and learning material.
similar_products.features:

+ Performance management to speed up "time to performance"
+ Visualize turnover and retention with AI-powered analytics
+ Increase retention with check-ins and pulses
+ Centralized Data Storage

similar_products.short_desc: We're creating a new standard in global HR, enabling every business to access better payroll, tax, benefits and compliance solutions.
similar_products.features: Remote helps companies of all sizes employ global teams for a low flat rate. We handle payroll, taxes, benefits, options, and compliance in countries around the world. With legal and HR experts in every country, Remote offers an easy-to-use solution for your global team while providing the strongest protections for your intellectual property. Whether you want to establish a new branch or employ a single person in a different country, Remote's global employment solutions have you covered.

similar_products.short_desc: Help your employees grow with an easy-to-build onboarding experience. Let them learn at their own convenience and quiz them at yours.
similar_products.features: Connecteam's customizable onboarding process takes only a few minutes to set up. Whether it's uploading a YouTube video, a PDF, or putting together a comprehension quiz- everything requires minimal effort. With set deadlines, your employees can learn and complete their studies at the time that is most convenient to their personal lives. Employees have around-the-clock access to teaching material and can digest information at their own pace, as many times as they need.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy, paper-free employee onboarding in minutes. Greet your next new-hire with a smile ? instead of a stack of paperwork.
similar_products.features:
Easy, paper-free employee onboarding in minutes.

Streamline your new-hire checklist with automated, paper-free onboarding, e-signature, document collection, and benefits enrollment. GoCo has everything you need to start your new-hires off on the right foot, and manage all your employee documents, and data.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Applicant Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Applicant Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Applicant Tracking software allows organizations to easily manage the hiring process by maintaining a database of applicant and job information. Applicant Tracking solutions can be used by organizations to collect applicant information and then filter, grade and match candidates' skills against job requirements. Many Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) include an interface that allows recruiters to manage all of an organization's job openings. Applicant Tracking software is related to Human Resource software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Client Onboarding software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Client Onboarding tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Client Onboarding Software (also known as Customer Onboarding Software) brings clients through the process of learning and implementing a recently purchased product or service.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Human Resource software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Human Resource tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Human Resource software, also known as a Human Resources Information System (HRIS) or Human Resources Management System (HRMS), enables an organization to manage employee records and information. Human Resource Management software allows you to organize contact details, department, attendance, salary, training, benefits and more. Many Human Resource Management systems and resource management software also interface with applicant tracking and payroll software. Human Resource Management software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Payroll software, Performance Appraisal software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Recruiting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Recruiting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Recruiting software helps recruiting, staffing and hiring agencies manage their operations by maintaining a database of applicant and job information. These solutions are used by organizations to collect applicant information and then filter, grade and match candidates skills against job requirements. Recruiting software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Human Resource software, Talent Management software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Talent Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Talent Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Talent Management software gives employers the tools to accurately manage, evaluate, and compensate based on employee performance. By tracking performance and standards, Talent Management software allows companies to create and maintain a high-performance workforce. Key features of this type of software include employee learning, compensation evaluations, policy compliance, and succession planning, all of which help companies manage personnel growth. Directories related to Talent Management software are Human Resource software, Performance Appraisal software, Succession Planning software, Training software, Workforce Management software, and Applicant Tracking software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Training software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Training tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Training software, also known as eLearning or Computer-Based Training (CBT) software, automates educational activities for students and/or corporate employees. Training solutions are often customizable based on the needs of specific organizations and include capabilities such as course registration and testing, certification tracking, conferencing, skills tracking, and reporting. Training applications may provide the framework for presenting classes, as well as an ecommerce functions, to allow for payments. Training software is related to Courseware and Learning Management Systems (LMS).

_source.short_desc: Employees have already been managing their own timecards, expenses, PTO, benefits and more. Now they can do their own payroll, too.
_source.long_desc: Paycom offers user-friendly HR and employee-driven payroll technology to enhance the employee life cycle, in a single software. Paycom drives efficiencies, increases data integrity and gives employees power over their HR information through a self-service app. Employees already manage their timecards, PTO, benefits and more. Now they can own their payroll, which results in improved accuracy, reduced employer liability, increased process oversight and unparalleled employee insight into their pay.
_source.target_audience: Paycom's single-application software helps companies automate and streamline payroll and HR processes without sacrificing rigorous data security standards.

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Status Tracking
category_features.definition: Reporting on changes over time to the state of a request, a prosess, or an object

category_features.name: Compensation Plan Modeling
category_features.definition: Performs calculations and analyzes how salary and equity should be awarded to employees across locations, performance levels

category_features.name: Compensation Statements
category_features.definition: Creates employee benefits statements that include all of a business? perks and incentives.

category_features.name: Employee Reward Programs
category_features.definition: Builds a system of rewards to encourage performance and link employee outcomes to business needs.

category_features.name: Incentive Management
category_features.definition: Manages incentive programs such as profit sharing, stock awards, and individual bonus plans,

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Salary Planning
category_features.definition: Manages salary reviews. Budgets, benchmarks and tracks all salary processes and associated costs.

related_products.short_desc: AI-powered technology to help run background checks.
related_products.features:
Checkr uses AI-powered technology to help run background checks so you can make safer, more informed hiring decisions in less time.
Join the 15,000+ companies relying on Checkr. Our customers include Airbnb, Netflix, Lyft, Papa John's, Elwood Staffing, Instacart, Hot Topic, Adecco and more.

related_products.short_desc: GoodHire provides simply better employment screening for companies of all sizes, across all industries
related_products.features: GoodHire delivers fast, accurate, and reliable background check resultswhile also offering the simplest background check workflow in the industry, making it easy for you to order and for your candidates to complete. Our advanced technology platform, built-in compliance tools, and automated workflows speed and simplify background checks for organizations of all sizes.

related_products.short_desc: Certn is a market leader in Human Risk Intelligence helping businesses perform fast & comprehensive background checks around the world.
related_products.features: Certn's fast, easy and reliable background checks make screening effortless and efficient. Get check reports in minutes from anywhere in the world. Our competitive pricing, build your-own-packages and best-in-class customer support have made us the leading background check company. White-label your account or seamlessly integrate with your ATS.  Certn provides global criminal background checks, credit reports, reference checks, education verification, driving records, id verification etc.

related_products.short_desc: Xref is trusted by businesses globally to offer reference, background and ID checks that are fast, simple and secure.
related_products.features:
Xref is a best-in-class, global solution that makes reference, background and ID checking fast, simple and secure. 

The user-friendly technology is backed by local support teams, offers multi-language capabilities and meets the highest global compliance standards (ISO 27001). 

Xref is accessible from any device and integrates with multiple leading HR tools and ATS platforms to offer seamless, end-to-end recruitment workflows.

related_products.short_desc: Good Egg provides a modern way to conduct employee screenings by looking at job candidates' past, present, and future behaviors.
related_products.features: Hiring has gotten riskier, thanks to the social media digital footprint. Not only that, but HR is under enormous pressure to hire quickly AND hire well, despite old screening methods that havent kept up. At Good Egg, we combine the human touch with lightning fast technology that not only looks at a person's past, but also their present and future behaviors. This helps HR managers hire more good eggs faster and with confidence, while maintaining 100% compliance.

related_products.short_desc: Verify users in real-time using email, phone or IP as we scan through 35+ social media platforms and allocate risk scores accordingly.
related_products.features: Ensure your users are who they say they are using real-time social media lookups and digital footprint analysis using email, phone or IP. We combine the power of whitebox machine learning and human insight for comprehensive detection and ensure you can perform KYC and AML checks with ease. Start your free 30-day free trial and enhance your digital credit scoring and minimize chargebacks today.

related_products.short_desc: Free property management software for landlords to market rental properties, take rental applications & screen tenants.
related_products.features: TurboTenant is the all-in-one, FREE property management tool that streamlines how you manage the rental process. Our rental marketing allows you to post across the web with a single click. Collect online rental applications and screen tenants (get credit reports & background checks). Powerful yet easy-to-use, TurboTenant will save you time, money, and headaches as you find your next tenant. Perfect for the 1-100 unit landlord, property manager or real estate agent. It's landlording made easy.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based background screening tool for businesses to conduct education/employment verification, criminal records check and more.
related_products.features: Cloud-based background screening tool for businesses to conduct pre-employment background checks such as education/employment verification, criminal records, litigation history, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Background check software that minimizes your time to talent in the safest, most compliant, and cost-effective manner possible.
related_products.features: Reducing your time to talent with the right employees is critical for business success. With Global HR Research you unify background check processes to give you faster, easier, more accurate background screening. We simplify your hiring and improve your candidates experience. Our dedicated support and solutions minimize your time to talent in the safest, most compliant, and cost-effective manner possible. Discover why thousands of clients, from startups to Fortune 100, choose Global HR Research.

related_products.short_desc: Providing Better Background Checks to over 30,000+ hiring managers in all 50 states.
related_products.features: Intelifi is an Accredited Background Check Company servicing Employment Background Checks Nationwide to 10,000+ Companies including Staffing Agencies, Healthcare and Human Resources. Our proprietary software, EMERGE is in its 5th generation and has become a leading Pre-Employment Screening Software in the industry. With over 40 various data vendors, Several ATS integrations, and a strong team of senior developers, Emerge has been recognized by the PBSA as a leading background screening provider

related_products.short_desc: Checkmate is an easy to use background screening tool. Simply pop in the candidate's details and we'll do the rest.
related_products.features:
Checkmate is a fully automated online reference checking and background screening software. 

Simplify your recruitment and onboarding experience by fully automating the process. Checkmate is fully mobile, branded and offers comprehensive customization.

similar_products.short_desc: EZ Screen allows employers to quickly conduct comprehensive & compliant background checks with a secure and easily navigable interface.
similar_products.features: Let's be real, hiring is stressful! Trust EZ Screen Solutions to help! EZ Screen allows HR Departments and Employers to quickly conduct comprehensive and compliant background checks with a secure and easily navigable interface for both the Applicant and User, by utilizing mobile optimized online/electronic consent forms and a streamlined user interface. Simply enter the Applicants name/email to start a background check. From start to finish the process is that simple! Call for pricing today!

similar_products.features:
The world's largest social media screening company and leader in the application of artificial intelligence technology in background screening services.

Work with the company that created the category of FCRA-compliant, AI-powered candidate screening solutions.

similar_products.short_desc: We bring faster, more accurate background screens to your fingertips. Our technology delivers more accurate screens, faster.
similar_products.features: Asurint was created by industry experts who saw an opportunity to break away from the status quo and re-imagine the background screening process. We applied technology to the process and created a continuously expanding system that uses intelligence to find informationnot just manpower or databases. In doing this, Asurint was able to break the mold set by others to revolutionize the industry. We grew from an idea of how to be better.

similar_products.short_desc: Sterling background/identity services offer a foundation of trust and safety that spans across industries, professions, and borders.
similar_products.features: Sterling - a leading provider of background and identity services - offers background and identity verification to help over 40,000 clients create people-first cultures built on a foundation of trust and safety. Sterling's tech-enabled services help organizations across all industries establish great environments for their workers, partners, and customers. With operations around the world, Sterling conducts more than 75 million background checks annually.

similar_products.short_desc: HiPeople's fraud detection provides reference and background checks you can trust. Automated your reference checks today
similar_products.features:
Collect references at ease and at scale.
Choose what you want to learn about a candidate, and who you want to learn it from. HiPeople verifies references, so you can focus on what matters. HiPeople's fraud detection provides reference and background checks you can trust.

Reduce your time-to-hire.
Save time with ready-to-use templates and ensure a seamless hiring experience. HiPeople collects your references in no time and fully automates the process. Relax, and let us handle the admin

similar_products.short_desc: Turn is Revolutionizing Talent Acquisition! Dramatically Speed Hiring and Reduce Costs with Autonomous Sourcing, Screening and Hiring.
similar_products.features:
Turn is the most advanced hiring solution to source, screen, and hire hourly workers. Turn's AI-driven talent acquisition platform autonomously identifies promising talent down to the street level across thousands of cities and the right channels to reach them from our proprietary database of almost 150 million active workers in the U.S. 

Today, companies in 30 industries from healthcare to last mile delivery use Turn to help manage their hourly workforce at scale.

similar_products.short_desc: An in-house reference checking solution that helps recruiters with lead generation, feedback, candidate analytics and reports.
similar_products.features: Vitay's platform for candidate reference checking allows recruiters to gain more insight into their candidate's performance while bypassing all the repetitive administrative work that goes into collecting this information manually. Vitay's cloud-based platform automates the process into just a few clicks allowing you to request references in under 60 seconds. Whilst helping to increase internal sales activities through the passive generation of leads with its built-in lead generation feature.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Applicant Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Applicant Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Applicant Tracking software allows organizations to easily manage the hiring process by maintaining a database of applicant and job information. Applicant Tracking solutions can be used by organizations to collect applicant information and then filter, grade and match candidates' skills against job requirements. Many Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) include an interface that allows recruiters to manage all of an organization's job openings. Applicant Tracking software is related to Human Resource software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Human Resource software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Human Resource tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Human Resource software, also known as a Human Resources Information System (HRIS) or Human Resources Management System (HRMS), enables an organization to manage employee records and information. Human Resource Management software allows you to organize contact details, department, attendance, salary, training, benefits and more. Many Human Resource Management systems and resource management software also interface with applicant tracking and payroll software. Human Resource Management software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Payroll software, Performance Appraisal software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Pre-employment Testing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Pre-employment Testing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Pre-employment Testing software gives HR departments and hiring managers the ability to evaluate job candidates quickly with computer based assessments. With Pre-employment Testing software you can measure a candidate's job skills, aptitude, and temperament prior to interviews or hiring. Looking for other ways to streamline your application and hiring process? Check out Applicant Tracking software, Human Resource software, Recruiting software, and Talent Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Recruiting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Recruiting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Recruiting software helps recruiting, staffing and hiring agencies manage their operations by maintaining a database of applicant and job information. These solutions are used by organizations to collect applicant information and then filter, grade and match candidates skills against job requirements. Recruiting software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Human Resource software, Talent Management software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Recruiting Agency software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Recruiting Agency tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Recruitment Agency software helps agencies hire full-time employees for organizations and streamline the entire recruitment process, from job posting and candidate sourcing to applicant tracking and interview management.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Reference Check software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Reference Check tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Reference Check software streamlines and automates the process of requesting and collecting job references. There are two types of Reference Check software. In the first type, candidates provide their referees? contact information to recruiters who then reach out to the referees through Reference Check software. The second type of software is a platform accessible by referees, candidates, recruiters, and HR professionals that allows candidates to reach out to the referees and collect references directly.
